name: Espresso
description: A rich, bold shot of pure coffee brewed to perfection — strong flavor and smooth crema.

name: Cappuccino
description: A perfect blend of espresso, steamed milk, and foam — creamy, aromatic, and comforting.

name: Cold Brew
description: Slow-steeped for 12 hours to bring out smooth, sweet flavors with a hint of chocolate.

name: Mocha
description: Chocolate and coffee come together in this delicious treat topped with whipped cream.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso topped with a small amount of steamed milk foam — simple and elegant flavor.

name: Latte
description: Silky smooth espresso blended with steamed milk and a touch of foam — mild and comforting.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed oranges packed with vitamin C and natural sweetness.

name: Mango Juice
description: Rich and thick Alphonso mango pulp blended to perfection — tropical delight!

name: Watermelon Juice
description: Cool and refreshing juice with the sweet and hydrating taste of watermelon.

name: Pineapple Juice
description: Tangy, tropical pineapple flavor served chilled for a burst of freshness.

name: Apple Juice
description: Sweet and crisp apple juice made from farm-fresh apples — pure and healthy.

name: Green Detox
description: A rich blend of strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries for a refreshing punch.

name: Cheese Garlic Bread
description: Crispy toasted bread topped with melting cheese and fresh garlic flavor.

name: Paneer Roll
description: Soft flatbread filled with spicy paneer, veggies, and tangy sauces.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Golden fried, crunchy chicken pieces — perfect bite-sized snack.

name: Paneer Pakoda
description: Deep-fried paneer cubes dipped in chickpea flour batter.

name: Spring Roll
description: Crispy rolls filled with sautéed vegetables and noodles — perfect starter.

name: Vada Pav
description: Mumbai’s favorite snack — spiced potato fritter served in a soft bun

name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, onions, and feta cheese with olive oil dressing

name: Caesar Salad
description: A colorful mix of seasonal fruits topped with honey and mint leaves.

name: Fruit Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan, and croutons tossed in creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Chicken Salad
description: Grilled chicken with fresh greens, sweet corn, and light pepper dressing.

name: Sprout Salad
description: rotein-packed green gram sprouts mixed with onion, tomato, and lemon juice.

name: Corn & Bean Salad
description: A healthy combo of corn, kidney beans, onions, and bell peppers with tangy lime dressing.

name: Pasta Salad
description: Boiled pasta mixed with veggies, olives, and Italian herbs in mayo dressing.

name: Russian Salad
description: Creamy salad with potatoes, peas, carrots, and mayo dressing.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated in herbs and spices, served with fresh salad.

name: Mutton Korma
description: Slow-cooked pork ribs glazed with smoky barbecue sauce — tender and juicy.

name: Beef Pepper Fry
description: Hot and spicy Kerala-style beef roasted with black pepper and coconut slices.

name: Pork Ribs BBQ
description: Slow-cooked pork ribs glazed with smoky barbecue sauce — tender and juicy.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Classic Russian dish with beef strips in creamy mushroom sauce served over rice.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: A Kashmiri favorite — tender mutton simmered in aromatic red gravy.

name: Pork Vindaloo
description: A Kashmiri favorite — tender mutton simmered in aromatic red gravy.

name: Mutton Cutlet
description: Crispy breadcrumb-coated cutlets made with minced mutton and aromatic spices.

name: Pork Roast Kerala Style
description: Traditional Kerala-style pork roasted with coconut bits and spicy masala

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Healthy and flavorful soup made with mutton bones, herbs, and black pepper.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Protein-packed soup made with red lentils, carrots, and light Indian spices.

name: Spinach Soup
description: Iron-rich spinach blended into a smooth, creamy green soup.

name: Vegetable Detox Soup
description: Light detoxifying soup made with cabbage, celery, and herbs — perfect for cleansing.

name: Oats Soup
description: Low-calorie, fiber-rich soup with oats, carrots, and pepper for a filling meal

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: Classic tomato soup blended with fresh basil leaves for a healthy twist.

name: Broccoli Almond Soup
description: Nutrient-rich soup made with broccoli, almonds, and low-fat milk — creamy yet light.
